cab.content: (Thfn Document it the Property 1* * a--. . "II HI AMI. 1 mSECRET. Prom Viceroy, 2Qth October 1917. (Received 30th October, 10.30 a.m.) Secret. Weekly report. All quiet North-West Frontier. Reportsreceived to date show that Muharram passed off quietly. No change in thegeneral military situation in India or Afghanistan. Desertions duringSeptember total 2,559 ; apprehended, 866.by the Secretary of State for India.
